channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Another zebra crossing needed on Sheep Ln, 5th November
item.description:
We're seeing lots of large vehicles speeding through the gapped speed bumps and we have only one crossing on Sheep Lane. Given the amount of foot traffic seen on the road, a raised zebra crossing should help pedestrians and lower speeds of vehicles.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Sheep Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amounts of litter, food waste, bricks, fox/dog fouling, debris, 5th November
item.description:
Please see attached sample photos. There is also lots of food waste (not captured on photos) with fox foulings in between them. Can you please ensure that street is cleaned urgently? Furthermore, please advise when last street/pavement cleanings took place? Are you adhering to the schedule as published on Bromley website?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wiverton Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet
